item.title: Graffiti on side door and boarded up window, 2nd February
item.description:

item.title: Bags of rubbish left by street cleaners, 2nd February
item.description:
A team of street cleaners cleaned along Abercorn Way and Oxley Close over two weeks ago. They left blue bags of cleaned rubbish on the kerb outside my house and at various other locations along the route that have not been collected despite two bin collections taking place since. People are now piling more rubbish on top of the bin bags and they are beginning to break and spill their contents.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oxley Close, Old Kent Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Verbally abusive man allowed his dogs to defecate on street, 2nd February
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Bouverie Road, Hackney, London
